name: PRMetrics
description: Augments pull request titles to let reviewers quickly determine PR size and test coverage.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: BaseSize
inputs.label: Base size
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum number of new lines in an extra small PR. If left blank, a default of '200' will be used.

inputs.name: GrowthRate
inputs.label: Growth rate
inputs.helpMarkDown: The growth rate applied to the base size for calculating the size of larger PRs. If left blank, a default of '2.0' will be used.

inputs.name: TestFactor
inputs.label: Test factor
inputs.helpMarkDown: The lines of test code expected for each line of product code. This check can be disabled by setting the value to '0'. If left blank, a default of '1.0' will be used.

inputs.name: FileMatchingPatterns
inputs.label: File matching patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: [Globs](https://aka.ms/PRMetrics/Globs) specifying the files and folders to include. Autogenerated files should typically be excluded. Excluded files will contain a comment to inform reviewers that they do not to need to review those files. If left blank, a default of '**/*' will be used.

inputs.name: CodeFileExtensions
inputs.label: Code file extensions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extensions for files containing code so that non-code files can be excluded. If left blank, a default set of file extensions will be used.
